testcase.name: Deletion of cart items
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://demo.spreecommerce.org' .................................... passed * header Accept = 'application/json' ...................................... passed * header Content-Type = 'application/json' ................................ passed * def AccessFeatureFile = call read('AccessToken.feature') ................ passed * def AccessToken = AccessFeatureFile.AccessToken ......................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ AccessToken ....................... passed Given header X-Spree-Order-Token = 'XI87zaszhndtURB0RjPkwg1652450630746' .. passed When path '/api/v2/storefront/cart' ....................................... passed When method DELETE ........................................................ passed Then status 204 ........................................................... passed * print "cart deleted "+ response ......................................... passed
